verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye the <S%H3050>LORD<s%>. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> from the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>: <S%H1984>praise<s%> him in the <S%H4791>heights<s%>. Praise ye the LORD. Praise: Heb. Hallelujah, etc
<S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye him, all his <S%H4397>angels<s%>: <S%H1984>praise<s%> ye him, all his <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.
<S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye him, <S%H8121>sun<s%> and <S%H3394>moon<s%>: <S%H1984>praise<s%> him, all ye <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H216>light<s%>.
<S%H1984>Praise<s%> him, ye <S%H8064>heavens<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and ye <S%H4325>waters<s%> that be above the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.
Let them <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: for he <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, and they were <S%H1254>created<s%>.
He hath also <S%H5975>stablished<s%> them for <S%H5703>ever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever<s%>: he hath <S%H5414>made<s%> a <S%H2706>decree<s%> which shall not <S%H5674>pass<s%>.
<S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%>, ye <S%H8577>dragons<s%>, and all <S%H8415>deeps<s%>:
<S%H2416>Beasts<s%>, and all <S%H929>cattle<s%>; creeping <S%H7431>things<s%>, and <S%H3671>flying<s%> <S%H6833>fowl<s%>: flying: Heb. birds of wing
<S%H4428>Kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and all <S%H3816>people<s%>; <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and all <S%H8199>judges<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>:

Let them <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: for his <S%H8034>name<s%> alone is <S%H7682>excellent<s%>; his <S%H1935>glory<s%> is above the <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H8064>heaven<s%>. excellent: Heb. exalted

He also <S%H7311>exalteth<s%> the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%>, the <S%H8416>praise<s%> of all his <S%H2623>saints<s%>; even of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7138>near<s%> unto him. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye the <S%H3050>LORD<s%>.
